Before you lies the „RassilonMonk's Cauldron of Nurgle“, a fan-crafted anthology that delves deep into the noxious secrets of the Old World's most despicable Diseases and Symptoms, concocted with the macabre ingenuity of Nurgle himself.

As you navigate this tome, be prepared to encounter afflictions that sprawl from the mundane to the grotesque, each woven with a malecolent creativity to challenge the hardiest of adventures.

Now that we've got our ChatGPT-enhanced intro behind ourselves, let me present you a collection of new Diseases and Symptoms prepared by RassilonMonk, who generously agreed to showcase them in this Armoury.

New Symptoms

  • @Symptom[Vertigo] — applies a penalty to Weapon Tests and Tests based on Agility, Dexterity, and Intelligence

  • @Symptom[Scarring] — applies a penalty to Fellowship Tests

  • @Symptom[Rashes] — applies a penalty to Dexterity and Fellowship Characteristics

  • @Symptom[Taint] — carries a risk of gaining @UUID[JournalEntry.NS3YGlJQxwTggjRX.JournalEntryPage.115GzWrmkD4viyy5]{Corruption}

  • @Symptom[Purblind] — applies a penalty to Sight-based Tests, including attacks

  • @Symptom[Wasting] — applies penalties to Strength, Agility, Toughness and Dexterity, as well as all Weapon Tests.

  • @Symptom[Dementia] — applies a penalty to Intelligence and Initiative
